statements: SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, total_goal FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, total_goal FROM fundraising_campaigns ORDER BY total_goal DESC;
SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, total_goal FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE total_goal > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, total_goal FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_goal FROM fundraising_campaigns ORDER BY total_goal DESC
SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE campaign_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC
SELECT campaign_name, total_goal FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE total_goal > 5000 AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-03-01' OR end_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, target_amount FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, count(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_donations > 5;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE target_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, target_amount FROM campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, donation_amount FROM campaigns JOIN donations ON campaigns.campaign_id = donations.campaign_id WHERE donations.donation_amount > 500 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY donation_date ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM campaigns JOIN donations ON campaigns.campaign_id = donations.campaign_id GROUP BY campaigns.campaign_id HAVING total_donations > 1000 ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, donation_amount FROM Campaigns INNER JOIN Donations ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Donations.campaign_id WHERE donation_amount < 500;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donors JOIN Donations ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_description FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(donor_id) AS total_donors FROM Donations GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_donors > 5
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT donor_email) AS unique_emails FROM Donors
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM Donors;
SELECT campaign_name, total_donations FROM CampaignStats;
SELECT donor_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donations;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM Donors WHERE donor_id = 5;
SELECT campaign_name, total_donors FROM Campaigns JOIN CampaignStats ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignStats.campaign_id;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donors JOIN Donations ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE total_goal > 1000;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, email FROM Donors ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT donation_amount as amount_donated, campaign_id FROM Donations WHERE donation_amount >= 50.00 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, donation_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'Success';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE total_goal > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns JOIN CampaignStatus ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignStatus.campaign_id WHERE CampaignStatus.total_donations > 5000 ORDER BY CampaignStatus.total_donations DESC;

SELECT d.donor_name, c.campaign_name, t.transaction_date FROM Donations d JOIN Donors d ON d.donor_id = d.donor_id JOIN Campaigns c ON d.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN Transactions t ON d.donation_id = t.donation_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations, c.campaign_name FROM Donations d JOIN Campaigns c ON d.campaign_id = c.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name ORDER BY total_donations DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.campaign_name, COUNT(d.donor_id) AS total_donors FROM Campaigns c JOIN Donations d ON c.campaign_id = d.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name HAVING total_donors > 10 ORDER BY total_donors DESC;
